Decrease-Blackout-Drill-textStart: One of the largest factories is conducting a blackout drill for emergency preparedness. Small demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Blackout-Drill-textEnd: The blackout drill has ended. Small demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Streaming-Platforms-Down-textSt: Major streaming platforms are down, significantly reducing internet activity. Small demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Streaming-Platforms-Down-textEn: The streaming platforms are online again. Small demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Social-Media-Break: Celebrity calls for Social Media Break
Decrease-Social-Media-Break-textStart: A major celebrity has called on people for a social media break to improve their mental health. Small demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Social-Media-Break-textEnd: Despite pledges, few could resist the pull of social media for long. Small demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Online-Platforms-Down-textStart: Due to a cyber attack, several large online platforms are down. People are now less online. Low demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Online-Platforms-Down-textEnd: The platforms are up again. Low demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Factory-Maintenance-textStart: Several factory buildings are shut down due to scheduled maintenance of the machinery. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Factory-Maintenance-textEnd: The scheduled factory maintenance has ended. Medium demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-High-Solar-Output-textStart: A cloudless sky and strong sun increase electricity generated from solar energy farms. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-High-Solar-Output-textEnd: Solar output decreased again. Medium demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-High-Wind-Output-textStart: Strong winds increase electricity generated from wind farms. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-High-Wind-Output-textEnd: Winds have returned to normal. Medium demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Earth-Hour-textStart: People participate in Earth Hour, turning off lights and electronics. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Earth-Hour-textEnd: Earth hour has ended. Large demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Power-Grid-Failure-textStart: Construction workers caused a district-wide power outage. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Power-Grid-Failure-textEnd: Power grid stability restored. Large demand increase expected shortly!
Decrease-Climate-Protest-textStart: Climate protesters glued themselves to roads shutting down most adjacent factories. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
Decrease-Climate-Protest-textEnd: The protesters were removed by police. Large demand increase expected shortly!
Increase-New-Netflix-Series-textStart: Everybody is about to watch the new series on Netflix. Low demand increase expected shortly!
Increase-New-Netflix-Series-textEnd: Most people have finished watching the new episode. Low demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-AI-Fridge-Leak-textStart: A leak about a prototype for an AI-powered fridge goes viral on social media. Low demand surge expected!
Increase-AI-Fridge-Leak-textEnd: The leak turned out to be a fake. Low demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Real-Estate-Rumors-textStart: Rumors about a large real estate firm struggling spur hectic online trading and social media buzz. Low demand surge expected!
Increase-Real-Estate-Rumors-textEnd: The rumors were found to be exaggerated. Low demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Celebrity-Scandal: Celebrity Scandal causes Social Media Frenzy
Increase-Celebrity-Scandal-textStart: A celebrity scandal just broke, leading a nation-wide social media frenzy. Low demand increase expected shortly!
Increase-Celebrity-Scandal-textEnd: The scandal has died down. Low demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Double-Shifts-Factory-textStart: Temporary double-shifts were introduced at the industrial center. Medium demand surge expected shortly!
Increase-Double-Shifts-Factory-textEnd: Temporary double-shifts at the industrial center ended. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-LLM-App-Launch-textStart: A new LLM wrapper app was launched and everyone is hyped. Medium demand surge by our data centers expected shortly!
Increase-LLM-App-Launch-textEnd: People realised that the new app was not so good. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Government-Press-Conference-tex: A highly anticipated government press conference on inflation measures has started. Medium demand surge expected shortly!
The press conference has concluded and social media activity is subsiding. Medium demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Championship-Game-textStart: The national sports championship is about to begin, leading to increased TV and appliance use. Large demand surge expected shortly!
Increase-Championship-Game-textEnd: The game has ended. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Citywide-Festival: City-wide Festival lights up the Night
Increase-Citywide-Festival-textStart: A large city-wide festival with extensive lighting and sound systems is underway. Large demand surge expected shortly!
Increase-Citywide-Festival-textEnd: The festival has concluded for the night. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
Increase-Reactor-7-Down-textStart: Technical difficulties at reactor #7. Large demand surge expected shortly!
Increase-Reactor-7-Down-textEnd: Reactor #7 will soon be back online. Large demand decrease expected shortly!
